lead_paragraph: A post by the American Embassy in Haiti was met with criticism over such celebrity visits and frustration with the pace of rebuilding since the 2010 earthquake.

headline.print_headline: Beyoncé Trip to Haiti Is Faulted
headline.main: As Beyoncé Visits Haiti, Facebook Users Show Skepticism

snippet: A post by the American Embassy in Haiti was met with criticism over such celebrity visits and frustration with the pace of rebuilding since the 2010 earthquake.
abstract: United States Embassy in Haiti asks Facebook followers where in country to invite pop star Beyonce to see humanitarian work that has been done since 2010 earthquake; receives much criticism from people who take issue with celebrity-based publicity or who say too little progress has been made.
